Package net.minestom.server.utils.cache

Class TemporaryCache<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minestom.server.utils.cache.TemporaryCache<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the object type to cache
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TemporaryPacketCache
    public class TemporaryCache<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Cache objects with a timeout.

public T retrieve​(@NotNull
                  java.util.UUID identifier,
                  long lastUpdate)
        Retrieves an object from cache.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the object identifier
        lastUpdate - the last update time of your identifier's object, used to see if the cached value is up-to-date
        Returns:
        the retrieved object or null if not found
